column4: Hi, i've downloaded the xubuntu 8.04 livecd i386 disk, but it doesn't boot on my system, i'm using an old version of xubuntu. The booting selection splash screen appears as usual, but it does nothing when i press enter
did u try the cd on other computer?
it could be the cd-r if u have another cd-r burn the .iso file at slower speed 2-4x and try again
try that, or if u can try replacing the cdrom drive, that could be the other reason
